channel.title: Way to stop logging to files n Workstation and Gateway?
channel.description:
Is there a way to disable logging to files such as syslog, kern.log and messages?
As per Linux help on the web, I tried a process where the first step is stopping the log deamon, but the command "sudo stop deamon" failed with stop command not found.

item.title: Way to stop logging to files n Workstation and Gateway?
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.source: Way to stop logging to files n Workstation and Gateway?
